"use strict";
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
const BaseCompExpand_1 = require("../BaseCompExpand");
const VectorTools_1 = require("../../utils/VectorTools");
class PlaneExpand extends BaseCompExpand_1.default {
    constructor() {
        super();
        this._normalVec = VectorTools_1.default.createVec3();
    }
    initComponent(targetcomp, owner) {
        super.initComponent(targetcomp, owner);
        var normal = this.__comp.normal;
        VectorTools_1.default.cloneTo(normal, this._normalVec);
    }
    get normal() {
        return this._normalVec;
    }
    get distance() {
        return this.__comp.distance;
    }
}
exports.default = PlaneExpand;
